entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
